comment: It's insanity. I was talking to a friend who voluntarily got the vaccine. I told him I wasn't getting it. He actually said it's GOOD that not everyone gets the vaccine. He had the sense to say that if there's something wrong with the vaccine, and everyone gets it, we're screwed.
